description: front: all-over embroidery with pink, black, purple, ecru, yellow, green, orange, red, metallic; sequins and mirrors embroidered into patterns; back: central orange panel with diamond embroidered patterns, surrounded by borders of embroidery, rickrack, sequins and lace; tassels at neck
medium: Silk, cotton, sequins, metallic thread, silver beads, mirrors; needlework
title: Wedding Coat
